alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Eastern Fall River; Hermosa Foothills; Northern Oglala Lakota; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foothills; Southern Oglala Lakota; Western Fall River (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 11 at 1:52PM MST until January 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM FRIDAY TO 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of southwestern and the Black Hills of South Dakota. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 5 PM Friday to 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Warning means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. Even if you are outdoors for just a few minutes, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Eastern Fall River; Hermosa Foothills; Northern Oglala Lakota; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foothills; Southern Oglala Lakota; Western Fall River
